description:
Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Le poussin géant et une bataille rose.
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu
The Friends` Whereabouts! The Chick of a Giant Bird and a Pink Showdown!

Птенец гигантской птицы и Розовое представление
